title: if you're an illegal drug user
body:
you're literally funding violent cartels who regularly kill women and children.

I think the most hilarious thing about drug users is that most of them are obviously liberals.  these massive hypocrites will go out and rabidly defend the creepiest people this world has to offer because in their simple minds they think it's the right thing to do but then they go out and help destroy basically every country in the world for the most selfish reasons.
